sentences.english: When Peng Liyuan begins to sing, 16 actresses in Tibetan clothes accompany her with dance.
sentences.chinese: 彭丽媛演唱，十六名藏族服饰的女演员为她伴舞。

sentences.english: And now, the person I admire most is Peng Liyuan.
sentences.chinese: 而现在，我最敬佩的人是彭丽媛。

sentences.english: This is one of Peng Liyuan's representative works of singing.
sentences.chinese: 这是彭丽媛演唱珠峰的成功作品。
